item.title: Creative Ads Specialist - Static + Video for Facebook - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

We've been selling wine online for 15+ years and I'm looking for someone to help with our creative advertising.

Specifically, I need someone who can help us churn out static and video creatives.

I have a figma file with 250+ pre made templates. We use Foreplay.co to save many other ad ideas. I've been making ads myself for years and will work closely with you on ideation and direction.

I'm looking for a lot of static ads, along with some video work. We have many customer testimonials for example, and lots of other video creative already. I'd like someone who can do mashups of our existing assets and perhaps help with overall direction/briefs for new concepts.

Hourly Range: $34.00-$90.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 19:22 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Advertising Design, Food & Beverage, Figma, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Creative Strategy
Skills: Advertising Design, Food & Beverage, Figma, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Creative Strategy
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit YouTube videos and create shorts - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking to have someone edit my voice notes and create visuals for YouTube videos and YouTube shorts.

I attached an example of what my daily video would be like.

item.title: Testimonial UGC For Supplement Brand - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for content creators that can make vertical tiktok style videos for a supplement brand with products containing adaptogens and functional mushrooms.
- Good lighting required
- No need for editing
- Must be willing to work with scripts and

* Attach previous work for a better chance to be selected.
